Package org.apache.calcite.test

Class ConnectionFactories

java.lang.Object
org.apache.calcite.test.ConnectionFactories
public abstract class ConnectionFactories extends Object
Utilities for ConnectionFactory and CalciteAssert.ConnectionPostProcessor.
